title: Suvikai Sit - Home
intro: A place for me to mess around
text:
Just an experimental personal website. The plan is that there is no plan and maybe I'll learn something along the way.

Possible outcomes: display art, build something silly, write about things that matter to me... Or just mess with the layout until I get bored.

⚠️ Disclaimer: I'm not a web developer and I don't know anything about web design.
